game.title: The Quest for the Golden Relic
game.objective: Capture the Golden Relic from the ancient pyramid
game.description: Embark on a perilous adventure to uncover the sacred artifact. Solve cryptic riddles, overcome traps, and outsmart the guardians to succeed.

task.description: Consult the library for a clue on where to find the artifact guide

task.objective: Decipher the hieroglyphs in the tomb map
task.description: Unravel the hidden message to uncover the entrance's coordinates

task.objective: Climb the pyramid and navigate the traps
task.description: Face the pyramid's challenges, including a rickety staircase and a booby-trapped passage

task.objective: Defeat the guardian and access the chamber
task.description: Battle the pyramid's guardian, then use the artifact guide to unlock the chamber door

task.objective: Claim the Golden Relic and claim victory
task.description: Rescue the relic from its pedestal and claim your place among history
